overview: In Lesbians Unchained, Girlfriends Films brings you four vignettes of bad girl lesbian trysts. First, Monique is planning a welcome home party for her former cellmate Sativa. The two of them get comfortable on the couch. Next Allie and Yurizan feel the thrill of a heist, and end up going down on each other. Dana and Sovereign get wet in a bubble bath together. Finally, maid Vicki bonds with burglar Adrianna and the two enjoy a licking lesbian encounter on the couch.
tagline: They did it their way! Sex starved lesbians bring on the heat and become unchained!
title: Lesbians Unchained
